item.description:
Dhol Baaje: Northeastern and MCPHS Annual Garba/Raas

DHOL BAAJE: A night of Garba, Raas and Bhangra! Join us at DHOL BAAJE for a fun filled night of dancing and fun with live, professional DJ and students from Northeastern and MCPHS! We will have the best garba, raas and bhangra music in the area! Water, food, and dandiyas will be sold at the event! Come join us for a great night!

Date: 10/16/2010
Location: MassArt Gymnasium 621 Huntington Avenue Boston, MA 02115
Time: 7:00 pm

Organized By: Northeastern University UTSAV

Cost: $7

Food: Food, water and dandia will be available for sale

Contact: nuutsav@gmail.com

Web: http://www.facebook.c...
Email: nuutsav@gmail.com
Directions: At the corner of Huntington Avenue (route 9) and Evans Way.
item.name: Northeastern University Garba and Dandia
